Html:
I would love an example, if possible, of implementing a Split Button Popup Control on a CommandBar.  I've read a couple of forums that state that this may not be possible, but I personally have been able to load a built in control and modify it a little bit.

Thanks,

MindCore

hello,

i find the following VBA topic: http://peltiertech.com/Excel/CustomDwgCmdBar.html

Set MyPopup = .Controls.Add(Type:=msoControlSplitButtonPopup, Id:=1692)

looks very typical i find. did you mean that?


*Sebastian

hello again,

i do a test for you and the following code works fine. (based on netoffice excel example09)

Office.CommandBarPopup splitbuttonPopup = (Office.CommandBarPopup)commandBar.Controls.Add(
MsoControlType.msoControlSplitButtonPopup, 1691, System.Type.Missing, System.Type.Missing, true);
